summary: This module implements a flexible, composable framework for parsing command‑line arguments and providing auto‑completion. It defines an abstract parser base, concrete parsers for common data types (paths, booleans, integers, choices, enums, key/value pairs, namespaces, etc.), mechanisms for documenting parsers, handling parsing state, and reporting success or errors during completion.
business_intent: To supply Ansible’s test suite with a reusable, extensible CLI parsing layer that validates input, converts values to native types, generates helpful usage documentation, and supports interactive completion, thereby simplifying command‑line interface development and improving user experience.
